question: Who was the French governor who was defeated by Robert Clive during the Anglo-French wars in India?
explanation: Dupleix (1697-1763) was the governor of the French settlement based in Pondicherry. The first Anglo-French war (commonly refered as the Carnatic Wars) took placed in 1744- 1748 AD. The wars between British and French in India lasted from 1744 to 1763 AD.
